Get Involved

Find out more

To find out more about our work and forthcoming activities, you can check out our current opportunities and sign up for our mailing list below.

Current opportunites

Data Science for Science Residency (19 July - 20 August 2021)

PhD students and postdocs across Cambridge have another chance to apply for a funded training course that is successfully equipping scientists with powerful tools to progress their research.

Apply Here

Accelerate Science is building a community of researchers working at the interface of AI and the sciences. As we build this community, we’d like to keep in touch! Contact us to find out more about our work and forthcoming activities.

Our Email:
